title: New Ranked System is the WORST
body:
It takes 30 mins minimum to play. People keep forgetting to lock in and there are not nearly enough prompts to make sure ppl dont get kicked out.

i wanted to play 2 games before sleep.....then i went to be without getting to even 1 game....this is so stupid.

replies.body: Why not post this on the na boards ,its not even been implemented on oce yet
dw gr8 im thankful you posted this, now i know not to get my hopes up too much
i voted no,i like waiting for 30 mins

All i see from streamers is the dynamic que is terrible.

Edit: Seems like solo is very slow, but queing as a 5man is very ffast.
DW OCE will fix your problem. Kappa
yup, i just got kicked out 2 more times....im done here. riot, pls fix ur mess.
